title: Great gifts for logophiles
subtitle: What to give the word lovers in your life
body:
Christmas is a magical time of year – if you forget about the stress of buying gifts, cooking an entire bird in the oven and having those awkward conversations with family members you see just once a year. 

If there’s a logophile in your life, check out these excellent Christmas, birthday and general celebration gift ideas. 

## 1. Scrabble & anything Scrabble related 
Almost every word nerd’s favourite game, [Scrabble](https://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B00DE6FZCK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=ohmynerds-21&camp=1634&creative=6738&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00DE6FZCK&linkId=b2fed3a0d2d055c6f50298e079ce9c68) is the classic logophile challenge. There are spin-off versions of the game, such as this 

But it doesn't stop there. You can get Scrabble-themed anything (almost) from [mugs with letters](http://amzn.to/2CA2NIP) on to necklaces that[ spell out words or phrases](https://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B00AWSMKSA/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=ohmynerds-21&camp=1634&creative=6738&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00AWSMKSA&linkId=efefd10ba7bb23d1507fd06140754813).
